articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Songdowon International Children's Camp
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Songdowon International Children's Camp
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, looked round the Songdowon International Children's Camp now being remodeled.
					 He went round various places including the campers building, the International Friendship Children's Hall, gymnasium, indoor swimming pool, aquarium and aviary to learn in detail about the progress made in the remodeling project.
					
					 Saying that the campers building and restaurant are being successfully built as required by the design ratified by the Party, he instructed officials to build them at the best level so that camping children may not feel any inconveniences.
					
					 Noting that the International Friendship Children's Hall was designed particularly well, he told officials that he would send latest equipment for watching films and sound facilities so that campers may fully enjoy films and varieties of video CDs.
					
					 After watching a large playground, he said that if a track-and-field course is made and the football field is covered with artificial turf, children would like them very much. Noting that a new modern gymnasium and indoor swimming pool are now under construction as parts of the remodeling project, he added that the campers would use them for training their physical bodies.
					
					 A new aquarium and aviary are now also under construction in the camp, he said, adding there is nothing to spare for the children, the precious treasures of the country. 
					
					 He noted that the remodeling project of the camp is an important construction project this year, adding: As I always stress, it is necessary to guarantee the quality of everything we are building for all eternity and only when we construct all things qualitatively, though they require a lot of efforts, is it possible to hand them to posterity with pride.
					
					 It is an important work for realizing the desires of great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who loved the children all their lives to remodel the camp as required by the Songun era, he said, expressing expectation and faith that the soldier-builders would wind up the remodeling project as scheduled, as intended by the Party.
					
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun, vice department directors of the Central Committee of the WPK and Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Visits Industrial Establishments in Hamhung City
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Visits Industrial Establishments in Hamhung City
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field survey of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					 The premier learned about the production of Juche fertilizer, Juche vinalon and ordered equipment in the complexes and held consultative meetings.
					
					 The meetings stressed the need to bring about innovations by keeping the production going at a high rate in the complexes.
					
					 The meetings also discussed the measures to increase the production by conducting management of equipment and technological control scrupulously, and for relevant units to satisfactorily supply raw and other materials.
					
					 Meanwhile, the premier learned about the production of the Hungsang Ceramic Factory.
					
					 He looked around the production processes of the factory. At a consultative meeting, he underscored the need to fully produce bricks needed for the construction of the stockbreeding base now under way in the area of Sepho.
					
					 Earlier, he went round the Taedonggang Building-materials Factory.

articles.title: 8th Conference of the Ideological Officials of WPK Opens
articles.content:
8th Conference of Ideological Officials of WPK Opens
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The 8th Conference of the Ideological Officials of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) opened in Pyongyang Monday.
					 The conference will analyze and review the successes, experience and lessons drawn from the struggle to imbue the party and the revolutionary ranks with the monolithic idea. It will also discuss the tasks facing the party ideological officials in taking the lead in upholding the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and ways to do so.
					
					 Attending the conference were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and other senior officials, information officials in Pyongyang and provinces, officials in the fields of the preservation of revolutionary relics, the media and literature and arts, exemplary information officials of primary organizations, leading officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions and those in provinces, cities and counties and industrial complexes.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok made an opening address.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, made a report.
					
					 He said that the conference, the biggest-ever in the history of the WPK, offers an important occasion in lighting a torch on the ideological front of the party and focusing the greatest efforts on the ideological work.
					
					 The reporter went on: Leader Kim Jong Il made a historic conclusion "On Some Immediate Tasks of Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism" at the 3rd Conference of the Ideological Officials of the WPK on February 19, Juche 63 (1974). This was an event of particularly great significance in strengthening the party and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and successfully accomplished the historic cause of proclaiming it as the supreme programme of the party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism. This helped the WPK underscore the revolutionary character as the party of Kim Il Sung which carried out party construction and activities as intended by Kim Il Sung only with Kimilsungism as the only guiding idea.
					
					 The past four decades which the WPK has covered under the banner of imbuing the whole society with the monolithic idea represent a proud history in which the example of the times was set in the party ideological work and a precious treasure was provided in the ideological work to be held fast to by the WPK forever.
					
					 A success made in it is that a radical turn was brought about in the contents of the ideological work.
					
					 New principle, system and method were established and powerful information and agitation means and forces provided.
					
					 The militant might of information and agitation was fully displayed in the socialist construction. 
					
					 The system and method of the party ideological work and strong forces and foundation provided by Kim Jong Il serve as valuable legacy for the development of the ideological work of the WPK.
					
					 The undying exploits performed by him for the party ideological work have been steadfastly carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of the WPK as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and set it as the supreme programme of the party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. The general orientation and duties of the party ideological work have been clearly indicated through his extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 Now the Korean revolution has entered such a new phase of its development as modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of the great party.
					
					 The reality calls for dynamically carrying out the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism by bringing about a revolutionary turn in the ideological work of the party.
					
					 We should deeply study and grasp the essence of the instructions Kim Jong Il gave and that of the policies he laid down while leading the party ideological work for a long time, regard them as the only criteria for conducting the ideological work and steadily carry them out.
					
					 We should make all the service personnel and people cherish the unshakable faith that only victory and glory are in store for them as they are led by Kim Jong Un and the single-minded loyalty that they would invariably advance along the road of revolution, following only him.
					
					 The reporter underlined the need to effectively conduct all forms of ideological education and thus fully prepare officials, party members and other people as genuine Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists.
					
					 He underlined the need for the party organizations and ideological officials to dynamically conduct the front-line style information and agitation campaigns to arouse the masses to the drive for implementing the idea of the party and defending its policies, and thus make a breakthrough in building a thriving nation by dint of ideology.
					
					 He also called for making the spirit of unprecedented creation and leap forward run high in all the fields for building socialism including agriculture, construction, science and technology by raising a strong wind of information and agitation work for carrying out the important tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 He stressed the need for the party ideological officials to consolidate the ideological position of the great Paektusan nation as an invulnerable fortress, cherishing faith that without a strong ideological position there is neither a powerful country nor beautiful dreams of people.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The conference goes on.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Liberation Tower
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Liberation Tower
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Sunday on the occasion of the Day of Defenders of the Motherland.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Ambassador Alexandr Timonin and Military Attache Dmitri Zheleznikov and staff members of the Russian embassy and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the Russian embassy was placed before the tower and the participants paid silent tribute to the memory of the fallen fighters of the Soviet army. 
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy also placed a wreath and flowers before the graves of fallen fighters of the Soviet army in Sadong District, Pyongyang on the same day.

articles.title: Voters' Meetings Held at All Constituencies
articles.content:
Voters' Meetings Held at All Constituencies
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- There took place oath-taking meetings of voters for the election of deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK at all constituencies from Feb. 21 to 24 to repay with loyalty the deep trust of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who sent his open letter to all voters across the country.
					 The open letter was read out at the meetings.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said that the open letter carries the noble intention of Kim Jong Un wishing all service personnel and people across the country to take part in the election as one, consolidate the people's power as firm as a rock and further consolidate the state and social system.
					
					 The nomination of Kim Jong Un as a candidate for deputy to the 13th SPA was a unanimous will and desire of all service personnel and people of the DPRK and a clear manifestation of their faith and will to achieve a final victory in building a thriving nation under the guidance of the great party, they noted.
					
					 They called for making positive contributions to the drive to greet the election with high political enthusiasm and shining labor success, further consolidate the people's power and build the socialist country into the most powerful one in the world and the people's paradise.
					
					 They also called on all service personnel and people to take part in the election as one and vote for the candidates with patriotism, cherishing the happiness and honor of having nominated Kim Jong Un as a candidate for deputy to the 13th SPA.

articles.title: Reclamation of Honggondo Tideland Makes Headway
articles.content:
Reclamation of Honggondo Tideland Makes Headway
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The reclamation of Honggondo tideland has been successfully pushed forward in North Phyongan Province, the DPRK.
					 The North Phyongan Provincial Tideland Reclamation Complex, after blasting 70,000 and 30,000 cubic meters of earth on January 5, is now channeling efforts into building the anti-tidal dyke No. 3.
					
					 The Jangsong, Tasa and Posan tideland reclamation companies in Ansan area and the Sinuiju Prefab Factory have rationally allotted labor forces and machines in order to speed up the construction.
					
					 The Tasa Mechanized Company has manufactured more than 100 kinds of accessories on its own efforts to keep all machines in full-capacity operation. 
					
					 The Sokhwa, Kwaksan and Roha tideland reclamation companies in Sokhwa area and the Chonggang Mechanized Company are trucking more than 4,000 cubic meters of earth on a daily average by cutting the unloading time.
					
					 Thanks to the devoted efforts of builders, the dyke is getting into shape as the days go by.

articles.title: Two More Men's Teams Qualified for Premier Leagues
articles.content:
More Teams Qualified for Premier League Matches in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Two men's football teams are qualified for this year's premier league matches in the DPRK. 
					 An official concerned of the DPRK Football Association, told KCNA:
					
					 Kwanmobong and Ponghwasan teams were additionally qualified for the league matches. As a result, 14 teams would take part in 6 rounds of whole or group league matches from March to late October Juche 103 (2014) with the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games as the first round.
					
					 The increased number of matches will make each team fully display their abilities. 
					
					 Premier league matches are expected to be held in the spotlight of many working people and football fans.

articles.title: Construction of Power Stations Progresses Apace
articles.content:
Construction of Power Stations Progresses Apace
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The construction of power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River has been pushed forward even in winter.
					 More than 110,000 cubic meters of excavation and filling were carried out in a little more than one month.
					
					 Builders from South Hamgyong Province have stepped up the construction of cofferdam, while excavating huge amount of earth for dam foundations and a room for sluice gate.
					
					 Those from South Hwanghae Province dug out more than 10,000 cubic meters of earth in January for the construction of Huichon Power Station No. 5, while those from the Ministry of Railways and North Phyongan Province excavating thousands of cubic meters of bedrock and earth respectively for Huichon power stations No. 10 and No. 6.
					
					 The same is true for those from Nampho City, the Kumyagang Hydroelectric Power Station Construction Company and the Thaechon Hydroelectric Power Station Construction Company.

articles.title: Measures Taken for Increased Agricultural Production
articles.content:
Measures Taken for Increased Agricultural Production
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Ministry of Agriculture have turned out in the efforts to carry out the tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in the historic letter sent to the participants in the National Conference of Subworkteam Leaders in the Agricultural Sector.
					 They have paid efforts to deeply grasp the letter in order to find out the right measures to make upsurge in agricultural production.
					
					 They have channeled primary efforts to hitting the yearly quota of grain output. They are minutely organizing the work to apply field-responsibility-system within the framework of the subworkteam management system.
					
					 They are also paying attention to introduce advanced farming methods in all co-op farms throughout the country, including the improvement in growing rice seedlings.
					
					 Effective farming methods including double cropping have been introduced in large scale to increase per hectare yield.
					
					 They have taken measures to enlarge the area for cultivating high-yield crops, while encouraging co-op farms to widely apply agro-forestry management.
					
					 Efforts are also directed at renovating irrigation facilities.

articles.title: Commemorative Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
Commemorative Stamp Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued an individual stamp in commemoration of the 50th anniversary of the publication of the socialist rural theses.
					 Seen in the stamp are a red ribbon bearing letters "In commemoration of the 50th anniversary of the publication of 'Theses on the Socialist Rural Question in Our Country'" and a sheaf with letters "Rice Means Socialism" in the middle of it.
					
					 On February 25, Juche 53 (1964), Kim Il Sung made public "Theses on the Socialist Rural Question in Our Country" to give definite answers to the peasant and agricultural questions and set forth the tasks for rural construction in the DPRK.

articles.title: Japanese Politicians Keen on Reckless Acts
articles.content:
Japanese Politicians Keen on Reckless Acts
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Japanese politicians have recently become the target of international criticism for letting loose a string of imprudent remarks.
					 Japanese Vice Prime Minister Aso, addressing the Diet, said that it is natural for a state to cherish the memory of those fallen in the war for the country. He even went the length of uttering that only a few countries had criticized Prime Minister Abe's visit to the Yasukuni Shrine in the world.
					
					 Cabinet special counsellor Honda, when interviewed by a U.S. group of media persons, said if the Japanese prime minister paid no visit to the shrine, it might weaken Japan's position in the international community.
					
					 Those remarks witness that Japanese authorities have no will to repent of Japan's blood-stained history of aggression.
					
					 It is a mockery of the international community that the Japanese politicians are making ill-considered remarks one after another to patronize the visit to Yasukuni that enshrines the war dead.
					
					 From a long time ago, Japan has praised the ill-famed war criminals as "manly men", "patriotic martyrs" and "heroes" while distorting history textbooks in a bid to implant the outlook on militarist history into the minds of growing generations.
					
					 Japan's behavior was so shameless as to make even a former president of Germany give an advice during his visit to Japan that the honest admission of the past is important for confidence-building.
					
					 It is clearly evidenced by Japan's acts of justifying its crime-woven past that the Japanese authorities remain unchanged in their sinister intention to reproduce its history of aggression.
					
					 Japan should bear in mind that the international community is highly vigilant against its moves lurching to the right.
					
					 The Japanese politicians had better opt for winning the confidence of the international community, though belatedly.

articles.title: Conference of Ideological Officials Serves as Occasion of New Turn in Work: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Conference of Ideological Officials Serves as Occasion of New Turn in Work: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The 8th Conference of Ideological Officials of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held here from Monday.
					 The conference will review the successes and experiences gained in the past struggle of modeling the party and the revolutionary ranks on one ideology, and discuss the tasks of bringing about a new turn in the ideological work of the party as required by the developing revolution and ways for doing so.
					
					 A revolutionary turn will be effected in the ideological work of the party and the DPRK advancing toward the eminence of a final victory will demonstrate the spirit of leaping progress with the conference as an occasion, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The WPK brought about a fresh surge in the socialist construction by concentrating remarkably greater efforts on the ideological work of the party in each important period of the developing revolution. It is the traditional leadership method of the WPK.
					
					 The party has attached great significance to the ideological work of the party in modeling the whole party and society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and convened the all-party conference of ideological officials.
					
					 It is the intention of our party to encourage all service personnel and other people to turn out in the struggle to bring about the prosperity of Songun Korea by simultaneously launching the wide-spread campaign on the ideological front of the party and waging a sweeping campaign of ideological work and information and agitation.
					
					 The conference is the first one of ideological officials on the road of advance in the new century of Juche to achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving nation after holding supreme leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem in the van of the party, the state and the army. Therefore, it will serve as a very significant one.
					
					 The appearance of Songun Korea making steady advance without any standstill is a clear proof of the inexhaustible might of the ideological work and information and agitation campaign of the party.

articles.title: S. Korean Unionists Urge Regime to Stop Denationalization
articles.content:
S. Korean Unionists Urge Regime to Stop Denationalization
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Government Employees' Union, the Teachers Union and the Public Transport Union of south Korea called a press conference in front of the "government" building in Seoul on Feb. 20 in demand of a halt to the denationalization of the public sectors, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 At the press conference speakers denounced the authorities' establishment of the High-Speed Railway Co., Ltd. under the pretext of improving management as the beginning of privatization.
					
					 They demanded the authorities stop such a move for privatization and ensure the right of workers.

articles.title: South Koreans Protest against Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets
articles.content:
South Koreans Protest against Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- There were protests in Seoul, south Korea on Feb. 21 against Japan's moves to grab Tok Islets, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The chairman of the Special Committee for Defending Tok Islets of the Seoul City "Assembly" said in a press conference at the "assembly" it is intolerable that Japan claims Tok Islets belong to its territory. 
					
					 He noted that he would declare the inauguration of the Federation of Civic Organizations for Defending Tok Islets on Friday.
					
					 Members of at least 20 civic organizations related with the issue of Tok Islets such as the Tok Islets Institute held a press conference outside the Japanese embassy on the same day.
					
					 In the press conference speakers strongly denounced Japan for describing the islets as a part of its territory at the "teaching manuals" for junior and senior high schools and planning to conduct a ceremony for "Takeshima (Tok Islets) Day" on Feb. 22.
					
					 Meanwhile, a civic organization held a rally in protest against Japan's reckless moves.
					
					 The participants in the rally said that they would stage a protest in front of the Yasukuni Shrine against Japan's shameless moves to grab the islets.
					
					 Members of the International Solidarity for Defending Tok Islets also held a press conference outside the Japanese embassy at which they demanded the Japanese right-wing government stop at once the wrong education of the rising generation aimed to grab the islets.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Romanian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Romanian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea" was posted by Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, on its website on February 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 The article said:
					
					 February 16 is a significant day marking the 72nd birth anniversary of HE Kim Jong Il, the eternal general secretary of the WPK and the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The undying feats of Kim Jong Il, the great statesman and tender-hearted father of the people, are recorded in the history of the DPRK which won a brilliant victory only.
					
					 He made public a lot of works to clearly indicate the way to be followed by humankind, developed the Korean People's Army into a matchless army and built a powerful socialist country through his original Songun revolutionary leadership and dedicated himself to the people all his life. His life is deeply cherished in the hearts of the Korean people.
					
					 The DPRK has achieved great successes in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and reunifying the country, firmly taking hold on the powerful nuclear deterrence. This is the noble fruition of his wise leadership.
					
					 The Korean people are dynamically advancing along the road of socialism chosen by them despite the unprecedented moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un to glorify the immortal exploits of the preceding leaders for all ages.
					
					 Progressive humankind is paying highest tribute to Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the common holiday.
					
					 His undying exploits will always be remembered by not only the Korean people but also the world people.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia exhibition took place in Ulan Bator, Mongolia on February 13 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).
					 Displayed on the front wall of the venue of the exhibition were the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the exhibition were personages of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia, Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia and the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, masses and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Ulan Bator.
					
					 N. Sarantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, said in his speech:
					
					 The exhibition will serve as an important occasion for visitors to look back upon the exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the human cause of independence and his sacred life.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great man who defended and glorified the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics the DPRK has turned into a power any powerful enemy dares not provoke, demonstrating its might all over the world.
					
					 Kimjongilia is a wonderful flower showing the strong spirit and will of the peerlessly great man.
					
					 We will propagate Kimjongilia to give wide publicity to the greatness of Kim Jong Il and make a positive contribution to developing the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 The participants looked round the venue of the exhibition.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on February 11 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of the conferment of the title of Generalissimo of the DPRK on leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The conferment of the title of Generalissimo of the DPRK on Kim Jong Il is an expression of the Korean people's boundless reverence for him, the statement said.
					
					 The Korean people are holding him in high esteem as the eternal leader of the revolution, it noted.
					
					 He began his Songun revolutionary leadership through his field guidance to Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA), it said, and went on:
					
					 He developed the KPA into the matchless ranks firmly defending socialism of Juche and dignity of the nation.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a military power with self-defensive nuclear deterrent and led the confrontation with U.S. imperialism and the drive for defending socialism to victory, performing great merits for the Korean and global revolution.
					
					 His cause is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is leading the Korean revolution to a victory under the unfurled banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The Korean people's revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun is sure to win.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Russia, a ceremony for opening week of DPRK film show in Germany and a film show in Angola between February 13 and 17 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present at the events were persons from various circles and masses of the relevant countries.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched a Korean film documenting immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the country and its people all his life and made a great contribution to developing the friendly relations between Russia and the DPRK.
					
					 He visited the Siberian and the Far Eastern regions of the Russian Federation in August, 2011, the last period of his life, in particular, and had a Russia-DPRK summit.
					
					 We are pleased that the Korean people are achieving the successes in the work for strengthening the national power and improving the people's living standard, rallied firm around supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We wish the DPRK greater victory this year.
					
					 The chairperson of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and other personages extended warm congratulations to the Korean people on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, adding: We wish the DPRK successes startling the world in the film art under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. Films will provide Germans with an opportunity to know better about the bright and happy life of the Korean people.

articles.title: Celebration Meetings, Photo Exhibition Held Abroad
articles.content:
Celebration Meetings, Photo Exhibition Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Celebration meetings took place in Nigeria and Romania and a celebration meeting and a Korean book exhibition in Nepal on February 12 and 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed at the venue of the book exhibition were works of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, secretary general of the Nigerian preparatory committee for celebrating the 72nd birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il successfully glorified the Juche idea and Songun idea as an eternal guiding idea of the DPRK and the great revolutionary idea of the era of independence.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic leadership the Workers' Party of Korea developed into a militant party with the oneness of ideology and leadership and strong sense of organization and discipline, and has demonstrated its dignity as a mother party which takes care of the destiny of the people with responsibility.
					
					 The DPRK turned into a powerful nuclear weapons state that remains unfazed by the nuclear threat of the imperialists, and the Korean People's Army is demonstrating its might as the powerful army strong in ideology and faith and the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 Exploits Kim Jong Il performed with lifelong dedication will shine forever as the noblest legacy which guarantees the accomplishment of the socialist cause and the realization of the human cause of independence.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, said in his speech:
					
					 Kim Jong Il defended the Korean revolution and the global cause of socialism by conducting brilliant ideological and theoretical activities and pursuing original Songun leadership at a time when the imperialists have become all the more undisguised in their arbitrary practices to stifle socialism.
					
					 He devoted all his life to the accomplishment of the socialist cause in the DPRK and the national reunification.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Nigeria and Nepal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Mexico
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" was brought out in booklet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on February 15.
					 A preface of the booklet said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and benevolent father.
					
					 He was an outstanding state leader, distinguished thinker and theoretician and world elder statesman as he built the WPK into ever-victorious and iron-willed party and the DPRK into an invincible power upholding the banner of Juche idea and Songun idea.
					
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that in order to successfully accomplish the socialist cause it is necessary to make the ideological work a key priority with a firm hold on it. It also says the basic task of the ideological work is to imbue the whole society with the socialist idea and that the ideological work should be conducted on the principle and method suited to the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon en reconstruccion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon en reconstruccion
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon en reconstruccion.
					Pasando revista a varios lugares, entre otros los albergues, la Casa de Ninos de Amistad Internacional, el gimnasio bajo techo, la piscina bajo techo, el acuario y la pajarera, averiguo en detalles el estado de la obra.
					
					Al decir que se ejecutan bien segun la demanda del diseno firmado por el partido la rehabilitacion y reparacion de los albergues y el comedor, ordeno culminarla en el nivel maximo para que los ninos no sientan incomodidades durante el campismo.
					
					Se trazo de modo singular el diseno de la Casa de Ninos de Amistad Internacional, dijo y prometio enviar los equipos de proyeccion filmica e instalaciones acusticas de ultima moda para que los campistas puedan ver a sus anchas los filmes y otras multimedias.
					
					En el campo deportivo allanado extensamente dijo que si se dispongan la pista de atletismo y la cancha de futbol que se cubre de cesped artificial, a los ninos les gustarian mucho. Prosiguio que esta vez se construyen de nuevo el gimnasio y la piscina bajo techo, los cuales ayudaran a los campistas en cultivar sus fuerzas fisicas.
					
					Tambien se acondicionan en el campamento el acuario y la pajarera, destaco y agrego que no hay nada que escatimar para los ninos, valiosos tesoros del pais.
					
					Subrayo que la reconstruccion del campamento es uno de los importantes objetos en la obra de este ano.
					
					Como enfatizamos siempre, debemos construir excelentemente todos los edificios arquitectonicos previendo cien o mil anos despues, acoto y acentuo que se debe construirlas cualitativamente, aunque se necesitan muchos esfuerzos, para entregarlas dignamente a las generaciones futuras.
					
					Manifesto su esperanza y conviccion de que segun el proposito del partido los constructores militares terminaran en el tiempo fijado la reconstruccion enfatizando que rehabilitarlo conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun constituye una labor importante para hacer realidad el deseo de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes en todas sus vidas amaron tanto a los ninos.
					
					Le acompanaron Han Kwang Sang, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y Jon Yong Nam, presidente del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Iniciada VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos de PTC
articles.content:
Iniciada VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos de PTC
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 24 en esta capital la VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					El conclave analizara y balanceara los exitos, experiencias y lecciones adquiridos en el tiempo pasado en la identificacion ideologica del partido y las filas revolucionarias y discutira las tareas y remedios que se presentan ante los funcionarios ideologicos del partido para apoyar al frente la causa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
					
					Asistieron Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y otros cuadros, los funcionarios propagandistas del centro y localidades, los funcionarios de las ramas de conservacion de datos de interes historico-revolucionarios, prensa e informacion, literatura y arte, los ejemplares propagandistas basicos y los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas, las entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, provincias, ciudades, distritos y complejos. 
					
					Choe Thae Bok pronuncio el discurso de apertura.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					El informante dijo que el presente certamen de mayor dimension en la historia del PTC sera un importante motivo para activar la labor ideologica del partido y fortalecer por todos los medios su influencia. 
					
					En la 3a Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, efectuada el 19 de febrero del 63 (1974) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo historico discurso resumen "Sobre algunas tareas inmediatas de la labor ideologica del partido para transformar toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo", lo cual sirvio de un acontecimiento de gran importancia en el desarrollo del PTC y en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, apunto y continuo:
					
					El Dirigente formulo la idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung como el kimilsungismo y proclamo como maximo programa del PTC la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo, gracias a lo cual se ha evidenciado el caracter  revolucionario del PTC como organizacion politica de Kim Il Sung que toma el kimilsungismo como unica guia directriz y desarrolla la construccion y las actividades del partido segun el proposito del Presidente. 
					
					La historia de 40 anos pasados por la identificacion ideologica de toda la sociedad fue orgullosos anales en que se ha creado el modelo de labor ideologica del partido y preparado la noble riqueza de la labor ideologica a ser mantenida siempre por el partido. 
					
					El exito mas notable es que fue registrado el cambio radical en el contenido de la labor ideologica. 
					
					Se han establecido nuevamente el principio, el sistema y el metodo en la labor ideologica, y  preparado los fuertes medios y fuerzas de propaganda y agitacion.
					
					Se ha manifestado plenamente el poderio combativo de la propaganda y la agitacion en la construccion socialista. 
					
					El sistema y el metodo, las poderosas fuerzas y la base de la labor ideologica del partido, preparados por el Dirigente, constituyen la noble herencia para el desarrollo de la labor ideologica del PTC. 
					
					Las imborrables proezas del Dirigente por la labor ideologica del partido se llevan adelante por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					El Mariscal definio la idea revolucionaria del partido como kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y presento la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo como maximo programa del partido. 
					
					Gracias a sus extraordinarias actividades ideo-teoricas, se han aclarado el rumbo general y el deber de la labor ideologica del partido. 
					
					Hoy dia, la revolucion coreana ha entrado en una nueva etapa de desarrollo para transformar toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo bajo la guia del gran partido. 
					
					La realidad actual demanda registrar el cambio revolucionario en la labor ideologica del partido para impulsar con dinamismo la causa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo. 
					
					Debemos estudiar y asimilar profundamente la esencia de las instrucciones y orientaciones dadas por el Dirigente durante su direccion de largo tiempo sobre la labor ideologica del partido, considerarlas como unica pauta de la labor ideologica y materializarlas permanentemente. 
					
					Hay que guardar la conviccion absoluta de que gracias al Mariscal se garantizan todas victorias y glorias nuestras e infundir a todos los militares y civiles la idea de fidelidad de marchar a pasos firmes por el camino de la revolucion siguiendo al Mariscal. 
					
					Es necesario hacer constantemente la educacion ideologica de todas formas para que los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y los trabajadores se preparen como verdaderos kimilsungistas y kimjongilistas. 
					
					Todas las organizaciones del partido y los funcionarios ideologicos tienen que desarrollar activamente la propaganda y la agitacion en el terreno para llamar a las masas a la campana por materializar la idea del partido y defender las politicas del partido y asi abrir la brecha de la construccion de un Estado prospero con la fuerza de ideologia.
					
					Hay que avivar la propaganda y la agitacion para materializar las tareas programaticas presentadas por el Mariscal en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo y de esta manera hacer reinar el impetu de creacion y saltos sin precedentes en todos los campos de la construccion socialista tales como la agricultura, la construccion, la ciencia y tecnica.
					
					Todos los funcionarios deben consolidar firmemente el baluarte ideologico de la potencia del monte Paektu con la conviccion de que si no hay la fuerte posicion ideologica, no habra la patria potente ni el sueno del pueblo.
					
					En el conclave hubo intervenciones.
					
					La conferencia continua.

articles.title: Tienen lugar actos de juramento de electores
articles.content:
Tienen lugar actos de juramento de electores
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar desde el dia 21 al 24 en todos los distritos electorales del pais los actos de juramento de los electores para las elecciones de diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema para responder con fidelidad a la gran confianza del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien les envio hace poco el mensaje abierto. 
					En los actos fue transmitido el mensaje abierto del Mariscal.
					
					Luego hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores enfatizaron que el mensaje abierto refleja el noble proposito y deseo del Mariscal de que todos los militares y habitantes del pais tomen parte en las elecciones de diputados a la APS para consolidar mas el poder popular y el regimen social del Estado. 
					
					La eleccion del Mariscal como candidato al diputado a la XIII Legislatura de la APS partio del unanime deseo de todos los militares y civiles coreanos y es una manifestacion de su conviccion y voluntad de lograr la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero bajo la guia del partido, afirmaron. 
					
					Insistieron en acoger con entusiasmo politico y brillantes exitos laborales las elecciones de diputados, consolidar mas el poder popular y contribuir a la conversion de la patria socialista en la mejor potencia del mundo y paraiso del pueblo. 
					
					Llamaron a todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y habitantes a participar como un solo hombre en las inminentes elecciones y votar a favor con el orgullo de haber elegido al Mariscal como candidato al diputado.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun resalta importancia de VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del PTC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun resalta importancia de VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del PTC
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Desde hoy tendra lugar en esta capital la VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del PTC. 
					El conclave hara balance de los exitos y experiencias logrados anteriormente en la identificacion ideologica del partido y las filas revolucionarias y discutira las tareas y remedios para registrar nuevo cambio en la labor ideologica del partido segun las demandas de la revolucion en desarrollo. 
					
					Con motivo de la conferencia, se imprimira un viraje revolucionario en la labor ideologica del partido y se demostrara plenamente el impetu de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que avanza hacia la victoria final. 
					
					Adelanta asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en el editorial publicado este lunes y continua: 
					
					En cada periodo importante de la revolucion, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea da importancia a la labor ideologica para levantar nuevo auge en todos los dominios de la construccion socialista. Esto es su tradicional modo de direccion. 
					
					El PTC convoco la conferencia concediendo gran importancia a la labor ideologica en la transformacion de todo el partido y toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo. 
					
					Tiene el proposito de iniciar la ofensiva simultanea en la labor ideologica del partido e intensificar la campana ideologica, propaganda y agitacion para movilizar a todos los militares y civiles a la lucha por abrir la era de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun. 
					
					El presente conclave reviste mayor significado porque se celebra por primera vez en la nueva centuria del Juche en que todos marchan hacia la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la de construccion de Estado prospero, teniendo al Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el puesto supremo del partido, el Estado y el ejercito. 
					
					El aspecto vigoroso de la Corea del Songun, que avanza siempre adelante, es una manifestacion del poderio inagotable de la labor ideologica, la propaganda y la agitacion del PTC.
